actions.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Beyer to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Beyer to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment removes a federal preemption and restores the full right to regulate towing to States and localities.
purpose: An amendment No. 42 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to remove a federal preemption and restore the full right to regulate towing to states and localities.
